name: Laser Grand Prix
overview: Laser Grand Prix is a laserdisc game created by Taito in 1983.  In Laser Grand Prix, you must first qualify in the 400-meter preliminary "Drag Race".  Once qualified, you move on to the "GP-Race", the "Spark Race", and then the final "Fantastic Race".  You have 70 seconds to reach the finish line by navigating through the course while avoiding collisions with the walls and other cars on the track.
